text: Guo Liang (born 24 December 1998) is a Chinese racing cyclist, who last rode for UCI Continental team . He won the scratch event at the 2018 Asian Cycling Championships and the gold medal in the team pursuit at the 2018 Asian Games, with Qin Chenlu, Xue Chaohua and Shen Pingan.Finals results He also competed at the 2019 and 2020 UCI Track Cycling World Championships. ==Major results== ;2018 : 1st 15px Scratch, Asian Track Championships : 1st 15px Team pursuit, Asian Games ;2019 : 1st 15px Scratch, 2018–19 UCI Track Cycling World Cup, Hong Kong : 2nd 15px Madison, Asian Track Championships ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Asian Games competitors for China
title: Guo Liang (cyclist)
